The world would be overrun by people who are too smart for their own good, leading to a dystopian society where only a select few can control the masses.
Society would have to adapt to a new way of thinking and functioning, as geniuses would be able to solve problems and create new technologies at an unprecedented pace.
The education system would have to be completely overhauled to accommodate the needs of geniuses, potentially leading to a divide between those who are naturally gifted and those who are not.
The concept of creativity and innovation would be redefined, as geniuses would be able to think outside the box and come up with ideas that were previously considered impossible.

The world would be filled with people who are capable of achieving greatness, but who may not have the motivation or drive to actually do so, leading to a society where potential goes unused and untapped.
